full_summary:
**Virtual Language Training Services for the Canada Revenue Agency**

**Procurement Reference**: cb-4113-55888863
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Tender Closing Date**: April 14, 2023 at 02:00 PM (EST)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: June 15, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: June 15, 2028

**Procurement Description**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking bids for virtual language training services for employees in the Atlantic and Western Regions. The contractor will provide full-time and part-time language training (English and/or French) to meet the linguistic needs of CRA employees.

**Scope of Work**

-Provide language training to meet the language proficiency requirements of CRA employees
-telephone tutoring and Preparation for Second Language Evaluation (SLE) evaluation level C oral interaction assessment
-Conduct training on an "as and when requested" basis
-Provide training to groups or individuals

**Contract duration**

The contract will be for a period of two years, with three one-year options to extend the contract.

**Eligibility**

-Indigenous businesses are encouraged to participate in this procurement.
-The Federal Contractors Program for employment equity applies to this procurement.
-Limited tendering is not applicable to this procurement.

**Evaluation Criteria**

-Technical merit and price
-Conformity to the requirements of the bid solicitation and the mandatory evaluation criteria
-Conformity to the conditions of the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business

**Proposal and Bid Submission Requirements**

-Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted in either English or French.
-Bid submissions must be made using the "Connect" service provided by Canada Post Corporation.
-Contact information:
Furqana Mehkari, Furqana.Mehkari@cra-arc.gc.ca, (613) 219-6096
-Attachments: 
The contract award will be based on the responsiveness of the bids, combined rating of technical merit and price, and compliance with the terms and conditions of the bid solicitation.
